response.job_title: Electronic Engineer from Universidad Nacional de Colombia
response.summary: Throughout my experience as a student assistant, I have improved my communication, leadership, and research skills, which have allowed me to perform my duties efficiently and always meet the goals and objectives in the following jobs. Working at Aperthura Tickets gave me a deep understanding of how Linux-based operating systems work, as well as concepts related to networking and embedded systems. Working at Virtual Guard, Inc. has allowed me to improve my English language skills and learn more about database management.
response.skills: Spoken English, Problem Solving, Linux, English, Research Skills, Programming, Security Operations, Organization Skills, Sustainable Development, TypeScript, Angular CLI, Microsoft Excel, Commitment towards work, Support Services, Laboratory Equipment, Team Leadership, Project Design, Python (Programming Language), Communication, Self Learning

company.name: Virtual Guard Inc.
company.description: Virtual Guard, Inc.offers cost-effective surveillance, intrusion detection, and reporting solutions that translate into a proactive, event-driven process for enhanced safety and security for government, public, and commercial organizations.  In real time, Virtual Guard searches for intruders, suspicious vehicles or packages, vandalism, and other possible threats to client facilities and personnel.
